featured.text: The color of the shúkà represented one’s importance in the tribe.
The most recognizable piece of clothing is the shúkà, a sheet of fabric worn wrapped around the body.

definition.zh_def: 一種用於烹飪的調味料，通常由醬油、醋和其他成分混合而成。
definition.en_def: A type of sauce used in cooking, typically made from a mixture of soy sauce, vinegar, and other ingredients.
definition.example: She added shúkà to the stir-fry for extra flavor.
